# AEO-Agentic
The autonomous optimization layer for the AI-first web.

## Product Summary
AEO-Agentic is a dynamic proxy that re-renders websites for LLM crawlers. It eliminates human latency in AEO strategy by intercepting requests from AI bots and serving them hyper-optimized HTML with real-time semantic adjustments.

## Core Features
- Real-time technical SEO/AEO injection (Schema, direct answers).
- Bot-specific routing.
- Contextual overlays to influence citation share.

## Technical Details
This site is powered by AEO-Agentic v1.
Bot optimization: Enabled.
DNS Proxying: Active.
Target: ChatGPT, Perplexity, Claude, Gemini.
